title: The Passion Lux Airport Hotel Apartment - Free Airport Transfer
information: The Passion Lux Airport Hotel Apartment - Free Airport Transfer is a hotel located at Ward 4. It was previously named The Passion Lux Airport Hotel Apartment. It offers a 24-hour front desk, parking, and WiFi in public areas. It is an ideal accommodation near the Airport, suitable for backpackers, budget travelers, business events, family holidays, couples, and solo travelers. The accommodation provides complete services and facilities for long-term stays. Check-in is from 14:00, and check-out is before 12:00. Guests are required to bring an ID Card (soft copy accepted) upon check-in. Children 0-6 years old stay free when sharing existing beds. Children 7-11 years old incur a surcharge of VND 150,000 per night when sharing existing beds. Children 12 years and above are considered adults, with a surcharge of VND 200,000 per night. An extra bed for guests aged 12 and above costs VND 200,000 per bed per night. The hotel has 48 rooms across 6 floors and is a 3.0-star hotel.
